verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> when we could no <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G4722>forbear,<s%> we thought it <S%G2106>good<s%> to be <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G116>Athens<s%> <S%G3441>alone;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> fellow <S%G4904>laborer<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%>

That no <S%G3367>man<s%> should be <S%G4525>moved<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we are <S%G2749>appointed<s%> <S%G1519>thereunto.<s%> <S%G5124><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>verily,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> we told you <S%G4302>before<s%> <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G3195>should<s%> suffer <S%G2346>tribulation;<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G1492>know.<s%>

For this <S%G1223>cause,<s%> <S%G5124><s%> when <S%G2504>I<s%> could no <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G4722>forbear,<s%> I <S%G3992>sent<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> lest by some <S%G3381>means<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3985>tempter<s%> have <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%> <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G737>now<s%> when <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> brought us good <S%G2097>tidings<s%> <S%G2254><s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>charity,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3417>remembrance<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3842>always,<s%> desiring <S%G1971>greatly<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to see you: <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2169>thanks<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> we render to God <S%G467>again<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3739>wherewith<s%> we <S%G5463>joy<s%> for your <S%G1223>sakes<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

Night <S%G3571><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1189>praying<s%> <S%G5228>exceedingly<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> that we might <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> might <S%G2675>perfect<s%> that which is <S%G5303>lacking<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> make you to <S%G4121>increase<s%> <S%G5209><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4052>abound<s%> in <S%G26>love<s%> one toward <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> do <S%G1519>toward<s%> you: <S%G5209><s%>

To the end he may <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G273>unblamable<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G42>holiness<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>saints.<s%>
